scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev --workspace shared" "npm run dev --workspace client" "npm run dev --workspace server"
scripts.dev:client: concurrently -k "npm run dev --workspace shared" "npm run dev --workspace client"
scripts.dev:server: concurrently -k "npm run dev --workspace shared" "npm run dev --workspace server"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: npm run build --workspace shared && npm run build --workspace client
scripts.build:server: npm run build --workspace shared && npm run build --workspace server
